1498327610987843587.text: "I hope that we will continue to be a place where these individuals who are leaving Ukraine because of fears about being tortured or imprisoned or killed because their membership in the LGBTQ community can come and find comfort and refuge," [Cicilline] added. https://t.co/8QM2vu7GfE
